defaults.style: watercolor illustration, vintage patisserie, soft cream and butter tones, hand-painted aesthetic, 64x64 game icon, white background

generators.prompt: cute young baker apprentice in chef's hat making dough
vintage recipe book with wooden spoon and reading glasses
copper and brass convection oven with warm glow inside
professional stand mixer with whisk attachment spinning
charming small bakery storefront with striped awning
industrial factory with cake conveyor belt and smokestacks
industrial frosting hose spraying colorful icing
cute robot chef with chef hat and whisk arms
sci-fi cloning vat with floating cakes inside green liquid
space station bakery orbiting Earth with cake windows
microscopic nanobots shaped like yeast cells
magical oven with clock hands and time vortex
star trek style replicator creating cake from energy
swirling portal showing cakes from alternate dimensions

upgrades.prompt: hands doing 67 weighing gesture palms up palms down
golden butter dish with halo glow
grandma portrait with thumbs up in ornate frame
whisk spinning so fast it's blurred
golden spiral with social media icons
DNA helix made of cake layers
